              I
               
              raise
               
              aloft
               
              the
               
              milk-white
               
              rose
              ,

speaker: YORK
text:
With
               
              whose
               
              sweet
               
              smell
               
              the
               
              air
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              perfumed
              ,

speaker: YORK
text:
And
               
              in
               
              my
               
              standard
               
              bear
               
              the
               
              arms
               
              of
               
              York
              ,

speaker: YORK
text:
To
               
              grapple
               
              with
               
              the
               
              house
               
              of
               
              Lancaster
              ;

speaker: YORK
text:
And
               
              force
               
              perforce
               
              I’ll
               
              make
               
              him
               
              yield
               
              the
               
              crown
              ,

speaker: YORK
text:
Whose
               
              bookish
               
              rule
               
              hath
               
              pulled
               
              fair
               
              England
               
              down
              .
